channel.title: R on metafunctor
channel.description: Recent content in R on metafunctor

item.title: Master's project: Reliability Estimation in Series Systems
item.description: I presented my master’s project in October 2023. It was titled ‘Reliability Estimation in Series Systems: Maximum Likelihood Techniques for Right-Censored and Masked Failure Data’.

item.title: likelihood.model R package
item.description: An API for constructing and working with likelihood models; works well with algebraic.mle R package

item.title: likelihood.model.series.md R package
item.description: An R package for constructing likelihood models for series systems with masked component cause of failure and other censoring mechanisms.

item.title: algebraic.mle R package
item.description: An API for algebraic maximum likelihood fitting

item.title: femtograd R package
item.description: An R package for backpropagation through a computational graph

item.title: wei.series.md.c1.c2.c3
item.description: R package in narrow support of my master’s project in reliability estimation for series systems from masked failure data like the component cause of failure being unknown or the failure being censored.

item.title: algebraic.dist R package
item.description: An API for an algebra over distributions

item.title: R Package: Dynamic failure rate (DFR) distributions
item.description: An API for constructing and working with dynamic failure rates.

item.title: R package: md.tools
item.description: An API for constructing and working with likelihood models; works well with algebraic.mle R package

item.title: Computational Statistics - SIUe - STAT 575 - Problem Set 2
item.description: This problem set covers the E-M algorithm for right-censored normal data with known variance.

item.title: SIUe - Computational Statistics (STAT 575) - Problem Set 4
item.description: This problem set covers sampling from a Gamma distribution using Metropolis-Hastings and acceptance-rejection methods.
